title: Help please!
body: I'm very excited to buy a new champ with the $10 worth of RP I bought but am torn between choosing Bard Riven or Nautilus, any suggestions?

replies.body:
Don't waste RP on champions except for 975s maybe WHILE ON SALE.
It's pointless.

Bard and Riven are both extremely difficult and not friendly to learn at all pretty much due to how intricate they are.
Nautilus is decently easy and quite strong.

People.. buy champions.. with RP?

 o  _  o

Those are some totally unrelated champions. The first two are very difficult and complicated to play well, riven is mechanically complex, and bard requires very good strategy and teamwork.
Yeah I'm trying to build a second page of runes right now so RP is how I'm buying champs for now

It depends on what you like to do, whose story or skins are appealing, etc.

Sticking to meta, I'd say {{champion:111}} and {{champion:92}}  are more diverse than {{champion:432}} ... It's not uncommon to see {{champion:111}} Top, Support, or Jungle. {{champion:92}} Top, Jungle, or Mid. {{champion:432}} is frequently Support....

Of course you do what you want. These champions are not locked in to the roles I named. 

Perhaps plan around Champion price reductions? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction

Or save for sales?
I feel like Nautilus and Bard are fun champs but bard and riven are better, idk if I want to play riven to counter Yasuo because I hate yas mains  or bard to have more fun

better is a a term that is miss used. any champ can be good and viable if you know how to play them. for the $10 of RP which comes out to 1380 rp i would look at a bundle to get alot of champs so you have more to play from. 

but naut is easier to learn and more forgivening

bard is a weird champ 

riven is hard to master
there are two bundles that both offer 20 champs and 1 skin for 975rp if you dont have those champs it would be the best way to get a good amount of champs for cheap
if you dont wanna do that there are alot of champs for 50%

In your Venn diagram, {{champion:432}} is the only champ that is "fun" and "better." Go with {{champion:432}} ...

{{champion:92}} is not fun and {{champion:111}} is not good (compared to the others) to you.

{{champion:432}} is both to you.
